confirmation.descriptionEn: #Your submission has been received Thank you for your interest. We will contact you within 3-5 business days. Go back
confirmation.descriptionFr: #[fr] Your submission has been received. Thank you for your interest. We will contact you within 3-5 business days. Go back

properties.titleEn: Do you attest that the information you are providing is true and correct to your knowledge?
properties.titleFr: Attestez-vous que les informations que vous fournissez sont, à votre connaissance, vraies et correctes ?

choices.fr: Je préfère les citrons aux oranges.

choices.en: I agree to keep my lemonade stand a minimum of 1 metre from the sidewalk.
choices.fr: Je m'engage à maintenir mon stand de limonade à un minimum d'un mètre du trottoir.
